Greeting!
Welcome the our War! so here's some rules:
 1) The game starts when both participant's score initiated with 0.
 2) In Order to take the next step, the user has to click 'DEAL'.
 3) The participant with the greater power level wins +1 score! the other stays the same.
 4) When it's a tie then both participants losing 1 point.
 5) When it's a tie and any participant has 0 points then they stay the same.
 6) The first participant that gets to 10 points is the Winner! congrants!


HAVE FUN!
